dict.acceptation: 一点，一块；少量，少许；一会儿，一转眼；[计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；
[口语]相当，有点儿，或多或少，多少[a bit to的省略]；
给（马）上嚼子；上衔铁；抑制；制约；
咬，叮( bite的过去式)；刺痛；咬饵；有咬（或叮）的习性；

sent.orig: At each offset in the file the 32-bit rolling checksum and its 16-bit hash are calculated.
sent.trans: 文件中的每个偏移都会被计算32-bit的滚动校验和及它的16-bit的hash值。

sent.orig: Distributed BIT-system is proposed after study to the test background and requirement of radar counter equipment.
sent.trans: 在研究雷达对抗装备测试背景及测试需求的基础上，提出分布式机内自检(BIT)系统。

sent.orig: The core processor is 32-bit micro processor based on the SPARC V8 specification.
sent.trans: 微处理器是基于SPRARC V8规范的32-bit微处理器。

sent.orig: I am particularly pleased that we agreed to launch negotiations of a bilateral investment treaty (BIT).
sent.trans: 我尤其感到欣慰的是，我们同意启动双边投资协定(BIT)的谈判。

sent.orig: Currently, I serve as manager for BIT Company's Information Industry division.
sent.trans: 目前，我任职于BIT公司信息产业部经理。
